website_summaries.verdict: This year’s Galaxy J3 is a lukewarm rehash of last year’s great budget phone. Go for the Moto E4 instead.
pros: Samsung’s Galaxy J3 for 2017 has a low price, a removable battery and 256GB external storage
cons: The J3 lags hard with less RAM than last year’s model
Cameras are low-resolution compared to budget rivals

website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy J3 Emerge is a solid, affordably priced midrange Android phone for Boost Mobile shoppers.
cons: Heavy UI layer with some bloatware

customer_reviews.title: Serial Number NOT Activated
customer_reviews.text: The serial number was not scanned before shipping rendering the phone completely useless. We purchased this as a gift, and as the event was not until after the possible return date, we were unaware there was a problem until the gift recipient informed us that the phone was worthless. It was very embarrassing AND we are stuck with a phone that NO ONE can activate and NO ONE can use, and we cannot return. Neither Amazon nor the seller have been cooperative.
customer_reviews.author: Gold City Mercantile

customer_reviews.title: Old man upgrading from flip phone.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product for the price. I have yet to master much of it's intended operations since as an 83 year old man, I have limited use for many of the features. I was able to download the user manual which has been extremely useful in getting started with basic operations as well as answering questions that might arise.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Tourigney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, very fast and runs multiple apps with no problem. One of the best phones I have owned. I particularly like the size as it fits in my pockets just right. I added a 32gb SD card, a hard case and screen cover. Great phone!
customer_reviews.author: Hott Dogg

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Only redeeming quality is the good battery life. This phone is crap, these phones just slowly crap out on you after not much time. I can barely type, the phone goes so slow that by the time it's typed out it happens 3 times. These phones just don't load, they're convenient when you're short on money but expect it to start shutting down and slowing down almost instantly. These phones are just kind of awful, they can't keep up with modern technology.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone. I had a Galaxy S4 before and I like this one better. It was a fraction of the cost. It does everything I need. The battery lasts all day long. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Silvercrown

customer_reviews.title: Phone
customer_reviews.text: Have had almost 4 weeks and still getting used to it. Has a much better battery life than my previous LG Tribute. Has way more apps than I will ever use and can not get them off. I think for the money it is a goid phone.
customer_reviews.author: Truck momma

customer_reviews.title: sound
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems with this phone since I got it. It's sound is terrible. I stopped working shortly after getting the phone. I miss get text messages because the it does not sound when a text comes in. Very frustrating ! This phone has terrible service as well. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.text: this phone is horrible!, it shuts off and power cycles when your on a call, in any app, and you sound like your under water to people when your in a call and have to use speaker phone just to be heard clearly all before the phone shuts off right in the middle of your call. this product is horrible! Samsung quality has really gone down hill, I have been only using samsung for the past 10 years, after this experience I will be going with apple.
customer_reviews.author: C.Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Great Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is currently the one I have now. I bought this as a backup for when my current J3 stops working. It's not overly complicated, and doesn't need all kinds of fancy features to work. It can be slow after a while, but for the first year it is fast, reliable and has a lot of storage space, 16G! It also has a removable sim card that I plan to move to the next J3, so I can keep all my information. Way easier than storing pictures and contacts to "the cloud" in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, exponentially better than my old LG cheapo phone that i got as a gift. Fits probably all of the social and utility apps you'll want on the internal storage which can be extended with an SD card. If you're not a huge phone addict that needs hundreds of apps and games at once, then this is a pretty good deal without sacrificing too much of the "triple A" feel, also the battery lasts me for a few days at a time on idle while connected to wifi so definitely no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: A bit compact with a decent battery. The camera is better than my old j7 perx. I'm just glad I could find an Android under a $100 for my Virgin Mobile plan.
customer_reviews.author: MulysaLove

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price. I got this for my mom and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome price. I got this for my mom and she loves it! Plus it came with a year of insurance for lost or damaged. Can’t beat it
customer_reviews.author: MoniceSharde

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This was actually just a replacement phone for my fiance. He'd absolutely loved the first one he'd had, but the screen somehow accidentally had gotten broken on the original one, so I ordered an exact replacement. Really a great phone for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: the measurements are incorrect on the website. Also free shipping but not to return. Returned product because it is a smaller phone than described and had to pay $10.00 for return shipping.

Otherwise the phone is in good condition

customer_reviews.title: Easy Access & Operation system!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my dad who's not great with technology. He loves it and it's handing it very well. I was able to create a personal contact list with pics of all my siblings, family members and easily remembered code for him. Helps him feel more independent while I feel more at ease. And because it's runs on the Boost network I can make sure the bill is paid and keep up with any updated for across country where I live. 5⭐s for the phone and Boost service!!

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy

It has an alot of network time outs, having trouble connecting to network, freezes up, stops playing music, its just a phone and will not do much more, and anyway I ordered the Samsung Galaxy J3 6, and Amazone sent me this J3 emerge, and its a piece of junk, I recommand do not waste your money you will be looking for another phone really fast.

customer_reviews.title: which got better reviews than the Galaxy J7
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this phone last week. I wanted an upgrade on my current LG Stylo 2 phone. Unfortunately I couldn't get service on this phone. They said it was an international phone. I called Amazon for a return and will get a full refund. I decided to order two batteries for the LG Stylo 2 for the moment. I may consider going for the LG Stylo 3 in the near future ,which got better reviews than the Galaxy J7. Better battery life and all around features. Amazon once again provided excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got this phone for my mom, I could barely ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone for my mom, I could barely hear her when I called her because her phone would go silent during a call, got the phone replaced with another J3 emerge and the second one did the same thing, I had to purchase another phone from a different store while waiting to get reimbursed from Amazon. Stay clear of this phone.

customer_reviews.title: Virgin Mobile has the worst costumer service of any of the No contract phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Virgin Mobile has the worst costumer service of any of the No contract phone companies- they also discontinue and change plans at will often leaving you in a lurch. Please note they have like 4 plan programs and not all phones are compatible with all plans despite being Virgin Mobile Phones- its lunacy. They have lost themselves a costumer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and inexpensive phone.
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I ever owned. My last phone was a Apple and this is 100 times better!! Battery life is pretty long. Memory is awesome, and easy to expand by adding a mini sd card. No bugs or glitches and I have been using the phone for about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: JMB0217

customer_reviews.title: Best Samsung in this price range.
customer_reviews.text: The best phone I've owned. I've been swapping out phones on my Virgin Mobile plan for years. Every year or so I get another model when the price drops to about $100. This Samsung model is by far my favorite. Bought the J7 and returned it after a few days and went back to this one. Perfect size, has all the features I want. Samsungs seem to run smoother and without the lag after using it for months. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Plantlovr

customer_reviews.title: Photos are wonderful. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I previously had an LG Optimus 9, and this phone is SO much smoother! Switching apps and playing games is without sluggish lag. Photos are wonderful. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn S

customer_reviews.title: Works  wonderd
customer_reviews.text: Ok I bought a memory card for it. Also a wallet that holds the cellphone. Works good. I must of downloaded at lease 20 apps. More room than my old phone. Good deal and good phone. There's a button on the bottom of the phone that gets you to the main menu. I don't have anything bad to say about this phone or the virgin mobile service. All I know is I Did use my same phone number and service from virgin mobile and everything transfer over in like 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy j3 for Boost mobile
customer_reviews.text: I originally had a Galaxy S3. Cracked the screen by dropping it. This phone has a bigger battery, talk to text works better. The signal strength is stronger than my old phone. I am completely satisfied with this phone. I did buy a flip shut case to protect the screen. Highly recommend this phone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: the phone I was sent had several cracks in the back panel, water damage as indicated by moisture contact indicator.
customer_reviews.author: brian peters

customer_reviews.title: Was tempted to remove a star...
customer_reviews.text: I was tempted to only give four stars because this doesn't have the famous (or infamous?) whistle notification, but the phone is great so far and I like it very much. If anything changes, I'll edit :)
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Blakemore

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware.

customer_reviews.author: LTR

customer_reviews.title: Virgin Mobile has been excellent where ever I have traveled
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have everything the more expensive Galaxies have, but it is very functional. In additional to using it as a phone, it has a well appointed developers section. Virgin Mobile has been excellent where ever I have traveled. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: Avoid New Sky Inc if buying this phone
customer_reviews.text: The seller New Sky Inc did not properly scan the phone making it unable to be activated by my carrier. The phone itself is a good basic phone but do not buy from New Sky unless you want to pay to have it unlocked

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy If you want to VR with Google Cardboard, problem with gyro
customer_reviews.text: I've got 2 Samsung galaxy j3 emerge phones from different places (one from Amazon and one from Target). Both of them have the same problem: the rotation of my head is not one to one with the rotation of the picture, so for example I would stand looking straight ahead and I will do a complete circle and I would end up in a different position, I have to spin in circles TWICE to return to the same place. All the inputs from the gyroscope are smooth and there's no drift. The turn of the phone compared to the turn of the picture is almost 2:1. The problem is in Cardboard app and all related apps, including Youtube 360 videos
customer_reviews.author: Dima

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone
customer_reviews.text: I'm still getting used to it, but so far it's a great phone for the price I paid.

customer_reviews.text: I got the 4" Samsung galaxy j3 emerge not the 5" as described. I purchased the phone because of it being 5". Extremely disappointed. What a rip off.

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy J3 Emerge - Prepaid - Carrier Locked (Virgin Mobile)
product_meta.description: With Android 6.0 (Marshmallow) and a Powerful Quad Core Processor, the Samsung Galaxy J3 Emerge will help you power through your day. Enjoy videos and photos with a crisp 5-inch HD display. And, expandable memory lets you store up to 256GB of pictures, videos, apps and games.
feature_bullets: 5MP Rear Facing Camera and 2MP Front Facing Camera

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars135 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: J3 Emerge handset, wall charger, USB cable, battery and printed materials.
